name: OS:Path
description: Small but tricky indie game to spend your evening on playing. You'll have to determine the cause of a program's critical error and restore its modules by playing mini games and solving puzzles while using the console.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or later Processor: 1 GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Memory, support OpenGL 3.3 or better Storage: 200 MB available space
